title: Chapter 1864 - An Unexpected Delight
body:
Chapter 1864 - An Unexpected Delight

Within the bronze palace.

Weng!

The sixteen massive bronze pillars rumbled and boomed, and the countless markings of the Divine Dao carved on their surface lit up, producing a strange, inscrutable energy fluctuation.

A moment later, the entire palace rumbled.

The Laws of Annihilation covering the place surged forth and poured into the palace, gathering at its center.

When Su Yi saw this, he raised his hand and tapped the Dao Manifestation Divine Disc.

Boom!

At the center of the palace, the gathered Laws of Annihilation rumbled and boomed. It was as if someone had opened a tunnel through the void; the Laws rapidly formed a vortex-like entryway.

This was the gate to the divine prison. Divine Venerate Tian Huang had left it here during the Primeval Era, and it had stood ever since.

A moment later, a clamor of excited voices resounded from within the prison.

“Hahaha! See that? The Divine Venerate hasn’t forsaken us!”

“How many years has it been? Is the Divine Venerate finally going to make good on his promise and usher us into the God Domain?”

“Wonderful! Wonder...
